Package repository

Interface CrudRepository<ID,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    ID - - type E must have an attribute of type ID
    E - - type of entities saved in repository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInMemoryRepository, StudentInMemoryRepository, TemaInMemoryRepository
    public interface CrudRepository<ID,E>
    CRUD operations repository interface

      • findOne

        E findOne​(ID id)
        Parameters:
        id - -the id of the entity to be returned id must not be null
        Returns:
        the entity with the specified id or null - if there is no entity with the given id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id is null.

      • findAll

        java.lang.Iterable<E> findAll()
        Returns:
        all entities

      • save

        E save​(E entity)
throws ValidationException
        Parameters:
        entity - entity must be not null
        Returns:
        null- if the given entity is saved otherwise returns the entity (id already exists)
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the entity is not valid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given entity is null. *

      • delete

        E delete​(ID id)
        removes the entity with the specified id
        Parameters:
        id - id must be not null
        Returns:
        the removed entity or null if there is no entity with the given id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given id is null.

      • update

        E update​(E entity)
        Parameters:
        entity - entity must not be null
        Returns:
        null - if the entity is updated, otherwise returns the entity - (e.g id does not exist).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given entity is null.
        ValidationException - if the entity is not valid.
